* @param finishByDate Date to finish the task by.
* @param done States whether the task is done.
* @param finishByDate Date to finish the task.Task by.
public Deadline(String name, boolean done, LocalDate finishByDate) {
* Retrieves the date of the deadline of the Pix.task.
* Formats the Pix.task into the format to save it in a text file.
* @return Returns the text representation of the task.
return done ? "D|1|" + name + "|" + finishByDate.toString() : "D|0|" + name + "|" + finishByDate.toString();
* String representation of a deadline task.
* @return Returns the string representation of the task.
* @param done States whether the task is done.
public Event(String name, boolean done, LocalDate eventDate) {
* Retrieves the date of the event.
* Formats the Pix.task into the format to save it in a text file.
* @return Returns the text representation of the Pix.task.
return done ? "E|1|" + name + "|" + eventDate.toString() : "E|0|" + name + "|" + eventDate.toString();
